/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The trees are lush and green, suggesting it might be spring or summer. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a blue roof, standing out against the greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding a unique perspective to the view.
